name: Croquettes
description: Our signature piece! Made from scratch butter creams are covered in Milk Chocolate and then hand rolled in peanuts. Also available with our made-from-scratch peanut butter center.

name: Milk Chocolate Assortment
description: Our signature assortment of classic chocolates. Each piece is made from scratch using the finest ingredients available. Enjoy rich creams, fruits, nuts, caramels, nougats and meltaways. 5oz - 5lb.

name: Dark Chocolate Assortment
description: Enjoy a wide variety of dark chocolates in our Dark Chocolate Assortment. Our finest pieces are dipped in our quality, pure dark chocolate, our nut selections are freshly roasted and our creams and meltaway centers made from scratch. Experience caramels, meltaways, fruits, nuts, and creams in this delicious assortment. 16 oz.

name: Peanut Butter Truffles
description: Our own made-from-scratch peanut butter center is blanketed in rich, creamy Philadelphia Milk Chocolate. A classic favorite. 1 lb. gift box.

options.name: Milk Peanut Butter Truffles - Gift Box
1/2 LB Milk & 1/2 LB Dark Peanut Butter Truffles - Gift Box
1 LB Dark Peanut Butter Truffles - Showcase

name: Assorted Nuts
description: A selection of our Milk Chocolate covered almonds, brazils, cashews, walnuts, pecans, filberts, and delicious pecanettes. All of our nuts are roasted in-house to ensure absolute freshness.

name: Caramel & Chocolate Apples
description: Our granny smith apples are hand dipped in our made-from-scratch caramel, smothered in Milk Chocolate, and covered in pecans. Makes a delicious autumn treat. Enough for two!

name: Pecanettes
description: Fresh whole Georgia pecans and homemade caramel. Why settle for anything less? So delicious...for looking like a large turtle!

name: French Mints
description: Enjoy our made-from-scratch mint meltaway center enrobed in our smooth Milk Chocolate. A perfect after-dinner treat. Dark Chocolate French Mints are available in 8 oz size.

name: Meltaway Assortment
description: Milk Chocolate Meltaway Assortment. A delicious assortment of Chocolate, Kahula, Cookies & Cream, Amaretto, Cherry Cheesecake, and more. 1 lb. Meltaways

name: Pack your Own Fruits
description: Choose from our delicious 1/2 dipped apricots, orange peel, apricot wedges, pineapple wedges, or dates in your choice of Milk or Dark Chocolate. Packaged in 1 lb boxes.

name: Peanut Butter Bar
description:
Set of five (5) Milk Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars.

Enjoy velvety smooth peanut butter contained in Philadelphia's rich and creamy Milk Chocolate. 1.75 oz

options.name: Peanut Butter Bar - Sealed Bag of 30

name: PCN Tours: Philadelphia Candies
description:
Philadelphia Candies is pleased to announce the Pennsylvania Cable Network recently visited and filmed a factory tour of our Hermitage, PA chocolate manufacturing facility. PCN is a non-profit statewide public affairs network and did not receive any funding from Philadelphia Candies for purposes of the tour.

PCN Tours has confirmed to us that our factory tour will premier on Sunday, December 16th at 8 p.m. EST and re-air the following morning at 7 a.m. EST.

Visit the PCN website at pcntv.com for more information or to watch online. We will have original copies of the film production available for sale beginning the week of December 17th in our retail stores and online.

http://pcntv.com/in-your-area/channel-designations/

name: Hot Cocoa Mix
description: A bag Philadelphia Candies Cocoa and a bag of sugar is packed in a Holiday Bag. Makes about 20 cups of cocoa. Recipe included.

name: Chocolate Nut Egg
description:
Milk or Dark Chocolate Nut Egg.

Enjoy our freshly roasted whole almonds, brazils, cashews and pecans mixed in our creamy Milk Chocolate. A classic Easter tradition.

name: Solid Milk Chocolate Bunny
description: 12 oz. solid milk bunny. A Philadelphia Candies tradition! Comes wrapped in a cellophane gift bag with chocolate ears perfect for nibbling. Dimensions for Milk, Dark, and White 12 oz. bunnies are all 7.5" x 3.2" x 2 inches.

name: Solid Dark Chocolate Bunny
description: 12 oz. solid dark bunny. A Philadelphia Candies tradition! Comes wrapped in a cellophane gift bag with chocolate ears perfect for nibbling.

name: Personalized Egg
description:
What's better than a chocolate egg? Have the Easter Bunny write your name across it in our delicious white chocolate. Everyone will be excited to receive this as an Easter gift, and what's better, you don't have to share! 

Choose from Milk or Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter, Nut, Coconut, Fruit & Nut, Maple Nut, Fudge Nut Egg, or Solid Chocolate Egg. 1lb. 

12 character maximum. Note** PLEASE SPECIFY WHAT NAME YOU WOULD LIKE WRITTEN IN THE ADDITIONAL NOTES SECTION IN THE CHECK OUT PROCESS. (Don't worry: If you forget to include a name, we will contact you via e-mail.)

name: Sea Salt Caramels
description:
We've answered your requests! Our sea salt caramels have the perfect blend of salty and sweet; you'll have eaten half of the box in no time! 

Our made-from-scratch chewy caramel is enrobed in your choice of milk or dark chocolate and sprinkled with just the right amount of Murray River Sea Salt. The perfect treat for any time of the day. 1 lb.

name: Pretzels
description: Our delicious pretzel twists enrobed in Philadelphia milk chocolate. Choose either: (1) Mini Pretzels or (2) Large Pretzel Twists

name: Potato Chips
description: The perfect combination of sweet and salty. A classic favorite. Comes in a 9 oz gift bag or order a 1 lb box from the showcase.

name: Peanut Clusters
description: One of our most popular treats! Our freshly roasted peanuts are hand-swirled in your choice of our rich Milk or Dark Chocolate. 1 LB.

name: Raisin Cluster
description: Our smooth and creamy chocolate is hand mixed with fresh raisins to form perfect bite-sized clusters. Choose either Milk or Dark Chocolate. 1 LB.

name: Coconut Clusters
description: Our handmade coconut clusters are one of our most popular creations. Choose from Milk, Dark or White Chocolate Coconut Clusters, or Milk or Dark Coconut Almond Clusters. Pictured at left is our White Chocolate Coconut Cluster. 1 LB.

name: Assorted Creams
description: A delicious assortment of our chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, raspberry, blueberry, orange, lemon, maple and butter creams. All of our cream centers are made from scratch. 1 pound signature gift box.

name: Milk & Dark Assortment
description: A wonderful combination of our finest assortment in our creamy, pure milk chocolate and delicious dark chocolate. 1 lb.

name: Assorted Fruits and Nuts
description: A choice selection of our finest dipped in our quality, pure milk chocolate. Enjoy a broad variety of homemade fruits and nuts in this delicious assortment. 1 lb. Specialty Box

name: Half Dipped Apricots
description: Our whole apricots are half dipped in your choice of our rich Milk or Dark Chocolate. A perfect treat for any time of the day. 1 LB.

name: Pecan Nougat Egg
description: Our made-from-scratch fluffy nougat center is covered in our creamy caramel and coated with pecans. A classic Easter tradition.

name: Caramel Pecan Egg
description: Our chewy caramel center mixed with whole freshly roasted pecans. Enrobed in our premium milk chocolate.

name: Cordial Cherries
description: A classic holiday treat for any time of the year. Our cordial cherry is the perfect balance of milk chocolate, cordial, and whole cherries. They're the perfect gift to share with family and friends, or better yet, to treat yourself. 16 oz.

options.name: 1 lb. Sugar Free Cordial Cherries - Showcase

name: Baking Cocoa
description: Our Philadelphia Candies baking cocoa, perfect for use in recipes. Great for making hot chocolate, just add sugar.

name: Sugar Free Boxed Chocolate
description: What else would you expect from Philadelphia Candies? Our highest-quality and most popular chocolates available in sugar free! A delicious assortment of nuts, creams, cordial cherries, french mints, marshmallow, pecanettes, peanut butter truffles, peppermint patties, and raisin clusters. No artificial sweeteners or replacements. 15 oz. signature box

name: Nougats
description: The finest, made-from-scratch soft nougat coated in Philadelphia Candies chocolate. A longtime customer favorite. 1 LB in either Milk or Dark.

name: Pack Your Own 1 lb. Creams
description: Choose 1 lb. of chocolate, vanilla, butter, maple, coconut, blueberry, strawberry, raspberry, lemon or orange creams in Milk or Dark Chocolate. Pictured at Left: Butter Cream (1) and Strawberry Cream (2)

name: Pack Your Own 1 lb. Nuts
description:
Choose 1 lb. of Milk or Dark Chocolate almonds, brazils, cashews, pecans, walnuts, macadamias, filberts, almondettes, cashettes, pecanettes or walnutettes. Pictured at left are Milk and Dark Walnuts.
 <font color="FFFFFF">Marzipan</font>

-ette indicates the product contains our homemade caramel, in addition to chocolate and nuts.

name: Pack Your Own 1 lb. Meltaways
description:
Pick your favorite meltaway.

Our smooth and creamy made-from-scratch meltaway center enrobed in our rich Milk or Dark chocolate. (Pictured is our Cookies & Cream meltaway, a favorite!) 1 lb.

name: Pack Your Own 1 lb. Sugar Free
description: Pick your favorite! Choose 1 LB of sugar free milk chocolate almonds, butter cream, cashews, cashew bark, cordial cherries, filberts, french mints, fudge meltaway, marshmallow, peanut butter truffles, peanut clusters, pecanettes, peppermint patties, raisin clusters, or vanilla caramel. Our sugar free chocolates contain no artificial sweeteners or replacements. 16 oz.

options.name: 1 LB Sugar Free Peanut Butter Truffles

name: Milk Chocolate Bar
description:
Set of five (5) Milk Chocolate Bars.

Enjoy our most popular bar, made with pure and rich Philadelphia Candies Milk Chocolate. A classic. 1.75 oz.

options.name: Milk Chocolate Bar - Sealed Bag of 30

name: Dark Chocolate Bar
description:
Set of five (5) Dark Chocolate Bars. 

Seriously intense Philadelphia Candies pure Dark Chocolate molded into a decadent bar. The perfect treat for yourself, or to share with a loved one. 1.75 oz

options.name: Dark Chocolate Bar - Sealed Bag of 30

name: Crisped Rice Bar
description:
Set of five (5) Milk Chocolate Crisped Rice Bars. 

Crunchy crisped rice mixed with creamy Philadelphia Candies Milk Chocolate. A favorite favor for children's parties. 1.75 oz.

options.name: Crisped Rice Bar - Sealed Bag of 30

name: Caramel Bar
description:
Set of five (5) Milk Chocolate Caramel Bars.

Seriously smooth liquid caramel combined with Philadelphia's pure Milk Chocolate makes a decadent treat any time of the day. 1.8 oz

name: Almond Bar
description:
Set of five (5) Milk Chocolate Almond Bars.

Enjoy the quality and richness of Philadelphia Milk Chocolate mixed with crisp, freshly roasted almonds. 1.75 oz

name: Almond Bark
description:
The finest dry roasted almonds combined with Philadelphia Candies pure milk chocolate. 6 oz. gift bag.

Also available in Dark Chocolate and White from the showcase.

options.name: 6 oz. Milk Almond Bark – Gift Bag

name: Philly T-Shirt
description: Chocolate brown high-quality soft t-shirt with vanilla lettering. American Apparel, 100% cotton. Made in the United States. <font color="FFFFFF">T Shirt Tee Shirt</font>

name: Philly Mug
description: Heavy Seattle Coffee Mug holds 16 oz of your favorite cocoa or coffee drink.

name: Nut Lover's Tower
description: 1 lb box of milk chocolate nuts, including freshly roasted almonds, pecans, cashews, walnuts, filberts, brazils, 1 lb box of milk chocolate Pecanettes and our 6 oz bag of milk chocolate almond bark. 2.38 pounds.

name: Chocolate Drizzled Popcorn
description:
A 12 oz tub of salted popcorn drizzled with chocolate and/or peanuts. The perfect accompaniment for watching favorite movies, large enough for a family to share.

Please note: Due to popularity, if ordering Popcorn your order may be delayed 1-3 business days depending on availability. For orders that need shipped immediately, please call to verify inventory.

name: Peppermint Patties
description: Our creamy, refreshing and cool peppermint center is made-from-scratch using the finest ingredients and coated in Philadelphia milk chocolate.

name: Sandwich Cookies
description: Delicious cookies with a smooth cream filling covered in our luxurious chocolate. Choose either Milk or Dark Chocolate! 8 cookies per box. Oreos

name: Milk Chocolate Graham Crackers
description: A perfect afternoon treat. Graham crackers smothered in our delicious Milk Chocolate. Make it even better: Pair with our made-from-scratch marshmallows for an instant S'More. 1 lb.

name: Mini Baking Basket
description: Our mini baking basket is the perfect gift for aspiring bakers! Includes a small stainless steel mixing bowl, baking cocoa, milk, dark and white melting chocolate, a mini whisk and measuring spoon, and Martha Stewart's best selling Cookies! recipe book.

name: Malt Balls
description:
A melt-in-your-mouth malt center, drenched in creamy milk chocolate. Also available in peanut butter!

The perfect snack for any party, holiday or occasion is also the best 'nosh' any time. 1 lb.

name: Cappuccino Coffee Beans
description:
A coffee bean center wrapped in premium milk chocolate.

The perfect snack for any party, holiday or occasion is also the best 'nosh' any time. 1 lb.

name: Dark Chocolate Espresso Coffee Beans
description:
A coffee bean center wrapped in premium dark chocolate.

The perfect snack for any party, holiday or occasion is also the best 'nosh' any time. 1 lb.

options.name: 1 lb. Dark Choc Espresso Coffee Beans

name: Chocolate High Heels
description: Our chocolate high heels have become famous with television acclaim! Each high heel is hand decorated and fully edible. Place an order online and receive any one of the high heels pictured, although selection may vary at any time. If you are interested in a specific design, please call us and we will gladly make a custom shoe for you.

name: Chocolate Shoes
description: Our chocolate shoes have become famous with television acclaim! Each shoe is hand decorated and fully edible. Place an order online and receive any one of the shoes pictured, although selection may vary at any time. If you are interested in a specific design, please call us and we will gladly make a custom shoe for you.

name: PolarPack Standard Refrigerant Gel Pack
description: By ThermoSafe Brands This nontoxic, reusable standard gel pack is an economical alternative to wet ice for shipping temperature-sensitive materials. Exterior is durable 4.1mil thick polyethylene film. Refrigerant changes phase at 0°C (32°F) and returns to gel state upon thawing. Highly recommended for shipping to warm-weather locations Dimensions: 10.5" X 7.5" X 1.25"
